pages.title: Tesla Power Tap
pages.text: The Tesla Power Tap allow you to extract energy from a Turbine.$(br2)This Power Tap can output energy using the Tesla $(l:misc/powersystem)power system$(/l) and it can be connected only to pipes or machines compatible with that system.
Only one type of Power Tap can be used to build a single Turbine.
$(l)Mandatory:$() no$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() no$(br)$(l)Power system:$() Tesla
